tool_description: Powerful tool designed to effortlessly retrieve video and image URLs from Pinterest, the popular social media and content sharing platform. With this API, developers can easily integrate Pinterest media extraction capabilities into their applications, allowing users to access and share their favorite Pinterest content.
name: Pinterest Media URL Extractor: Download video & image
title: Pinterest Media URL Extractor: Download video & image
tool_name: Pinterest Media URL Extractor: Download video & image

api_list.name: extract-media
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a streamlined approach to retrieve video and image URLs from Pinterest boards, pins, and profiles, offering a rich source of engaging media content.
